name: ArrowHead (RhymH, PondGames)
description:
Best played in fullscreen ! Leave your Highscores in the comments ! Windows Version available.

Arrowhead is a game developed for the VimJam: Collectables game jam.

Play as a prisoner trapped in a dungeon with an endless hoard of angry skulls trying to hunt you down. Your only defence: a bow with 5 arrows.

Collect your arrows once they've been shot to reuse them, and get back to safety to fire again. How long can you last in this endless nightmare?

Theme integration

Having to collect your arrows after they've been shot fits both the "collectibles" focus and the theme of "there and back".  Enemies will occasionally drop bomb arrows and health pickups to collect too.

Controls

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys
Aim: mouse
Shoot: left mouse click

Credits

Developed in Unity by Pierre Hebinger a.k.a. Rhym
Art made with Aseprite and sounds made with Bfxr by Daniel James Freer
Palette used: NA16

Music :  TeknoAXE Double the Bits (CC)
